All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Centroid
This class stores three HashMaps in order to be able to store each centroud ratings and to calculate the mean of all values in the centroid.
CollaborativeFiltering
This class implements the recomendation algorithm collaborative filtering.
ConjuntItems
This class represents a set of items in the form of an ArrayList extension.
ConjuntRecomanacions
This class describes a set of recommendations as an extenssion of ArrayList of recommendations.
ConjuntUsuaris
This class describes a set of users as a extension of a users ArrayList.
ContentBasedFiltering
This class implements the recomendation algorithm content based filtering.
ControladorDomini
Controller of the
ControladorDominiAlgorisme
This class is used to call the algorithm and keep saved its parameters.
ControladorLoad
The class ControladorLoad implements the function for loading data from memory.
ControladorPersistencia
The class ControladorPersistencia implements the functionalities of writing and reading data from memory.
ControladorSave
The class ControladorSave implements the function for storing data in memory.
HybridFiltering
This class implements the recomendation algorithm using a combination of Content-Based filtering and Collaborative Filtering.
Item
Classe represent un item d'un conjunt items
Item.tipus
This enumaration represents the types that an attribute can have (ID, Nom, Boolean, Float, String, Date)
ItemValoracioEstimada
This class joins an item with an estimated rating, and reimplements the the comparator function to be able to sort it.
Recomanacio
This class describes a recommendation of a item to a user with a possible rating.
StringOperations
Class that works with strings and types that are associated for strings
UnionIntersection
Class for working with arraylists that act like sets, in particular, the union and intersection of those sets
Usuari
This class represents a user.
